## PointsTool class

使用 primitive 添加点位数据，性能更好 可以选择把点位渲染为 billboard、label，聚合功能可选

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PointsTool extends ToolBase<ToolBaseOptions, PointsToolEvents>
```

**Extends:** ToolBase&lt;ToolBaseOptions, [PointsToolEvents](./cesium.pointstoolevents.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new PointsTool({})

tool.enable()
tool.addPoints(config)
```

## Methods

| Method                                                        | Modifiers | Description          |
| ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | -------------------- |
| [addPoints(option)](./cesium.pointstool.addpoints.md)         |           | 添加点位集合         |
| [clear()](./cesium.pointstool.clear.md)                       |           | 清除                 |
| [destroy()](./cesium.pointstool.destroy.md)                   |           | 销毁                 |
| [enable()](./cesium.pointstool.enable.md)                     |           | 启用                 |

| [removePoints(id)](./cesium.pointstool.removepoints.md)       |           | 移除点位集合         |
| [togglePoints(id, show)](./cesium.pointstool.togglepoints.md) |           | 点位集合显隐         |
